Rules and Regulations:
- Each team consists of 8 players with 6 active players at the time of play and 2 - substitutes.

(Singing competition)  (Group)

- Only branch-wise duo/groups are allowed.
Maximum duration of 3 minutes to be provided for each participant.

fields.title: THROWBALL (BOYS)
fields.description:
-One of the best benefits of playing throwball is that it helps burn off calories. It also helps you
maintain a healthy weight; reduce the risk of heart diseases, diabetes and hypertension. The
physical constant movement in throwball builds the muscles of lower as well as Upper body.
- Rules and Regulations:
- Each team consists of twelve players with 5 active players at the time of play and 2 substitutes.
- The match is played for best of 3 sets for 25 points in each set with rally score.
- Entry per team: 700
- Event Type: knock down
- Duration: 20 mins
- Venue : old lawn

fields.title: KABADDI (GIRLS)
fields.description:
Kabbadi is another of our very own sport which has now gained international popularity and
is a great way to exhibit and test a teams reflex, teamwork and strength. It's a sport that
requires putting strength to use through strategic planning.
- Rules and Regulations:
- Each team shall consist of no more than 10 players with only 7 taking to the field at any one
time.
- The duration of the match is two halves of 10 minutes with a half time break of 5 minutes.
- The game continues in this way until the time is up, the team with the most points at the end
of the match is declared the winner.
- Per team: 1000/-
- Event Type: knock out
- Duration: 20 mins
- Venue : Father Agnel Sector 10a ground

fields.title: BEAST MODE (BOYS)
fields.description:
One participant from each branch will come and participate in extreme physical activities.
- Entry per person: 50
- Event Type: knockout
- Duration: 1hr
- Venue : old lawn

2) Garticipants need to bring there waste material
3) No pre-prepared material to be brought which would led to disqualification

easy to conduct and manage. Box cricket is a fast paced and super fun version of cricket which
the audience and players can enjoy equally.

- Only one team is allowed from each branch

fields.title: Monoacting: Drama House
fields.description:
- Another fun event conducted by the drama house, an acting competition which will throw light on your theatrical
talents.
- RULES:
- You have to either perform a mono or duet act .
- Time limit per act is 7 minutes.
- Acts will be judged on the basis of points system by the judges.
- Exceeding the time limit will lead to immediate disqualification.
- Any vulgarity or obscenity will lead to disqualification.
- No direct political reference is allowed.
- Eliminations will be conducted if required prior to Etamax.

fields.description:
Inspired by the famous Spanish series Money Heist.
- Students will be given clues related to the -show and they have to find the final treasure.

Overview
- �Team: 4 participants
- �Groups can be formed among different branch students
as well.
- �Initial clues will be provided to the participants.
- �Teams need to crack the given clue to find the next clue.
- �All the clues will be hidden within the college campus only.
- �The team to crack the last clue and find the treasure in the shortest time shall be declared as the winner.

fields.description:
- Participants will have to solve clues and get to the final riddle, this game is heavily related to the popular series stranger
things.
- Rules and regulations:
- Day 1 - Season 1/2
- Day 2 - Season 3
- Day 3 - Season 4 vol.1/vol.2
- � There will be 2 rooms: Real World and Upside
- � Teams have to keep minimum 2 people in real world and
minimum 2 people in upside down and they can communicate
only via walkie talkie.
- � One member will be tied up and the team to untie the member in the least time will be declared the winner.

- The blitz version of this popular indoor sport is less time consuming and is more inclined towards
the intellectual side. It's different from the traditional chess as this version is short time and this
limited time requires the player to be observant and react instinctively and quick.

- Rules and Regulations

& for the Finals 30 minutes will be Given to each player.

- All the participants must be present 10 minutes prior to the event.

- Prize money will be given to 1st place holders.
